Script.Name: Keep thumbnail cache after reboot
Script.Code: Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00 [HKCU\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\VolumeCaches\Thumbnail Cache] "Autorun"=dword:00000000 [HKLM\SOFTWARE\WOW6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\VolumeCaches\Thumbnail Cache] "Autorun"=dword:00000000
